archimate:Device.name: Shelving Display Panels (SDP)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Digital signage for pharmacy shelves, storerooms, supply areas, and medication bins, showing stock status, item names, expiry alerts, or inventory instructions.
Specifications:
• Display Type: o E-Ink or low-power LCD (non-glare) • Screen Size: o 2.9” to 7.5” per shelf display • Resolution: o Minimum 240 x 160 pixels • Update Method: o Centralized over Wi-Fi or Zigbee/BLE mesh • Battery Life: o 3–5 years (for E-Ink models), replaceable coin cell battery • Mounting: o Shelf clip, magnetic base, or adhesive mount • Content Support: o Text, icons, barcodes/QR codes • System Integration: o API access for ERP/inventory system syncing • Durability: o Dust-resistant, light impact tolerance (IP52 minimum) • Power Supply (if LCD): o Rechargeable via micro-USB or fixed power rail
